ygData.subject: Re: XP Penalty
ygData.msgSnippet: All the elves and shorties have around the same EXP penalty, around 20% Humans don t have penalty Erudites and Barbarian level up a little bit faster than
ygData.messageBody:
All the elves and shorties have around the same EXP penalty, around 20%

Humans don't have penalty

Erudites and Barbarian level up a little bit faster than elves/shorties, around
10%

Ogre has a worse EXP penalty than elves/shorties, 25% I think

Trolls has the worse, at least 30% I estimate it to be 50%

LKW wrote:

> From: LKW <leekw13@...>
>
> Oh forget to mention erudite - an advanced human race, do they suffer from

>

> wiz will gain xp and rise lvl faster the the elf wiz?
> >
> > If this is true, what is the penalty like? Any percentage? How abt amg
> all non-human races - eg compare troll vs half-elf or dward vs ogre?
> >
> > Thx.
> >
> > Mondain
